name: ACHI_GOALIE_WIN

description: Manage a team in the top leagues in Russia, Sweden, Finland, Germany, the UK, the Czech Republic, Norway, Switzerland, and France.

name: ACHI_OUTRACING_THE_ROCKET
description: One of your players scores 50 goals in 50 (or fewer) games.

name: ACHI_UNDERTAKING_A_STREAK
description: One of your players reaches 21 fights in a season with no losses.

name: ACHI_CENTURY_OF_FUTILITY
description: Manage a team during its 100th season since winning a championship or beginning play.

name: ACHI_THE_200_CLUB
description: One of your players scores 200 points in an NHL season.

name: ACHI_GORDIE_HOWE_HAT_TRICK
description: One of your players has a goal, assist, and fight in the same game.

name: ACHI_GOING_UP
description: Your team is promoted to a higher league.

name: ACHI_THE_OUTSIDERS
description: Win the Russian Championship with a non-Russia based team.

name: ACHI_TSUJIMOTO
description: Select a Japanese player in the NHL draft.

name: ACHI_CENTENNIAL_CUP
description: Win the Stanley Cup with Toronto (2018) or Montreal (2019) on the hundredth anniversary of their first Cup victory as NHL teams.

name: ACHI_NATIONALISM
description: Play a game with a lineup composed of players entirely from the nation your team is based in.

name: ACHI_UPSET
description: Win a playoff series against a team that finished ahead of you in the regular season.

name: ACHI_WOLD_CHAMPIONS
description: Win the World Championships.

name: ACHI_GOLD
description: Win the Olympic Ice Hockey Tournament.

description: Win Bronze at the Olympic Ice Hockey Tournament.

name: ACHI_MOVING_UP_IN_THE_WORLD

name: ACHI_REAL_DYNASTY
